* {{ja-r|烏骨鶏|うこっけい}}: [[silky]], [[silkie]] {{gloss|breed of chicken}}

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|にわとり}}
Originally derived from the {{m|ja|枕詞|tr=makura kotoba||pillow word|pos=an [[epithet]] as a poetic device}} compound phrase ''niwa tsu tori'', {{compound|lang=ja|sort=にわとり|庭|tr1=niwa|t1=garden|つ|tr2=tsu|pos2=possessive particle, analogous to modern Japanese {{l|ja|の}}, ''no''|鳥|tr3=tori|t3=bird}}, used in {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=にわとり}} poetry as an allusive introduction to ''kake'', the older word for “chicken” (see below). The medial ''tsu'' disappeared over time, yielding modern Japanese ''niwatori''.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|にわとり|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|雞}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|にわとり|ニワトリ|hhira=にはとり|kyu=鷄}}

# a [[chicken]] (a bird)

=====Synonyms=====
* {{ja-r|臼辺鳥|うすべどり}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|かけ}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=かけ}}. [[onomatopoeia|Onomatopoeic]] of the sound made by a chicken.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> Compare English {{m|en|cluck}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|かけ}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{l|ja|雞}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|かけ|kyu=鷄}}

# a [[chicken]] (a bird)
#* {{RQ:Kojiki|Kami tsu maki}}
#*: {{lang|ja|爾波都登理　'''迦祁'''波那久}}
#*: {{lang|ja|庭つ鳥　'''鶏'''は鳴く}}
#*:: {{lang|ja|にわつとり　'''かけ'''はなく}}
#*:: ''niwa tsu tori, '''kake''' wa naku''
#*::: the garden bird, the '''chicken''' clucks

=====Synonyms=====
* {{ja-r|臼辺鳥|うすべどり}}

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|くたかけ}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=くたかけ}}. Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=くたかけ|くた|tr1=kuta|pos1=root for numerous verbs, implying [[low-grade]], [[rotten]], [[stinky]]|かけ|tr2=kake|t2=chicken|pos2=see above}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

Formerly a [[derogatory]] term for a chicken. Over time, the derogatory sense was lost, and the term instead took on an [[old-fashioned]] or [[archaic]] sense.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|くたかけ}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|くたかけ|kyu=鷄}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=くたかけ|archaic}} a [[chicken]] (a bird)

=====Usage notes=====
Occasionally seen with the reading {{lang|ja|くだかけ}} (''kudakake'').<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

=====Synonyms=====
* {{ja-r|臼辺鳥|うすべどり}}
